item.title: Security.txt!? What is it and Why do we Need it
item.author: Author
item.description: You all know about robots.txt already but are you aware of the proposal security.txt and how it will help your app/company? Security researchers often face problems when it comes to communicate the site-owner/company about a vulnerability and the app can be not in any bug bounty programs. Then, how should researcher share this information? Majority of time, the vulnerabilities found are just left undisclosed because of problems on communication side.
